page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT & ECONOMICS
page.content: Although predominantly a{farming} community,very few now work on the farms,their labour replaced largely by machinery.The small businesses in the village do not offer employment opportunities though some require part-time help.Most women with children are housewives,though some have part-time{work}as cleaners, knitting machinists,factory workers, insurance collectors.There are 4 women employed full-time.The men have varied {jobs}e.g.garage mechanics,builders, hauliers,river inspectors,engineers & gas/oil rig workers.About 25% of the village are retired people.We are fortunate that only 3 men in Denton are unemployed.There are a few self -employed people as well. Most people use{banks}in Bungay or Harleston,though the Giro-bank is available through the Post-Office.
